: BrightBlade simply watched as Klant rolled up to her, suddenly coming up 
and aiming his gun towards her.
But she simply looked at him, not a hint of ammusement or anything on her 
face.
She kept her gun aimed towards his head, knowing for a fact that if there 
was a shoot out she would win.:

" Ha! We both know that my weapon is superior to yours, and that I shall be 
the victor...while you get a one way tickey to the Pit!"

: But even though her trigger finger was getting edgy, she heard this 
Maximal out. Though, she had to admit...it was boring!
She sighed, cocking her gun.:

" I'm TRYING to escape. What's it look like?!!"

: But then she smiled.:

" And the only reason I used that bomb on that Maximal was because, 
surprisingly enough, I had no intention on killing him. He saved my life, 
and for that I spared him."

: BrightBlade eased her grip on her gun.:

" Unlike you..."

: Her voice calm and emotionless as she suddenly shifted her aim towards 
Klants chest-plate and fired, moving to the side so that Klant's charge 
wouldn't touch her.:

**********************************

: Rage shifted under the weight of the great tree which had fallen on her, 
the sudden icy feeling around her skill melting in the afternoon sun to the 
pont of movement.
But it was still in her mind, she had to get away!

With a large heave of her great body she mannaged to wriggle out from under 
the fallen tree, staggering to her feet.
She was still wounded and bleeding, in pain and generally cranky. But she 
still was going to get away if it killed her, which she would try to avoide.

Rage growled plaintively as she began to slowly move off into the woods and 
away from the Alliance base, her vision a bit blured and her steps unsure.*
